narrative.narrative: FlyEgypt was founded in 2014 and began flying on February 12th,2015. It initially was a charter airline but its transitioned into being a regular scheduled budget airline as well. Its bases is Cairo but it also has a hub in the country of Kuwait. One of its first charter routes it did on a regular basis was Marsa Alam,Egypt to Zurich,Switzerland. Scheduled service in 2016 includes three routes to and from Kuwait at the Egyptian cities of Alexandria,Assiut and Sohag. Its fleet at October 2015 were two 737-800's.
